com.sociam.android.report

Class ReportActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
          • android.app.Activity
            • android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
              • com.sociam.android.report.ReportActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.location.LocationListener, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback

    public class ReportActivity
extends android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
implements android.location.LocationListener
    This class is the main activity for reporting an incident.

    Report page uses slide pages which is implemented by pager adapter. MyFragmentStatePargerAdapter controls the sliding pages.

    When the class called, a Crime object was created in order to store user input. The class also starts location listner in order to get the user's location.

    Author:
    yukki
    See Also:
    FragmentStatePagerAdapter
